creator: maduraka@electroteks.com
text:
When I replace the images included in a JSP file with a new set of images 
(probably larger in file size), the Session gets automatically dropped by the 
web server, so that, after refreshing the page, contents of the Session 
objects are gone.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This works for me with a simple test case.

Please follow this up on the users mailing list.
